achievements: Published 'Summa de Arithmetica, Geometria, Proportioni et Proportionalita' (1494), a groundbreaking work on mathematics and accounting
Prolific Baroque painter known for his dynamic compositions and masterful use of color
Produced a vast body of work including frescoes, altarpieces, and easel paintings
Worked in Naples, Rome, Spain, and other European cities
Won the Golden Boot in the Serie A in 2006
Scored over 300 goals in his professional career
Played for several Italian clubs including Fiorentina, Juventus, and Palermo
Known for his expressive and dramatic frescoes
Known for films like 'Call Me by Your Name' and 'Suspiria'
Won numerous awards including an Academy Award nomination
